title: DLC-GUI crashing on training, and not using GPU
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

I start DLC GUI and everything went fine till I reached the training stage. On clicking training the following shows up and then DLC gets stuck.


Starting with imgaug pose-dataset loader (=default).
Batch Size is 1
Initializing ResNet
Loading ImageNet-pretrained resnet_50
2022-08-06 05:04:05.076131: I tensorflow/core/platform/cpu_feature_guard.cc:141] Your CPU supports instructions that this TensorFlow binary was not compiled to use: SSE4.1 SSE4.2 AVX AVX2 FMA
2022-08-06 05:04:05.101766: I tensorflow/core/platform/profile_utils/cpu_utils.cc:94] CPU Frequency: 4199990000 Hz
2022-08-06 05:04:05.102329: I tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/service.cc:150] XLA service 0x5595c94663c0 executing computations on platform Host. Devices:
2022-08-06 05:04:05.102344: I tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/service.cc:158]   StreamExecutor device (0): <undefined>, <undefined>
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190519: I tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_gpu_executor.cc:998] successful NUMA node read from SysFS had negative value (-1), but there must be at least one NUMA node, so returning NUMA node zero
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190666: I tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/service.cc:150] XLA service 0x5595c8bd0830 executing computations on platform CUDA. Devices:
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190682: I tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/service.cc:158]   StreamExecutor device (0): NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060, Compute Capability 8.6
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190762: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1433] Found device 0 with properties: 
name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 major: 8 minor: 6 memoryClockRate(GHz): 1.807
pciBusID: 0000:09:00.0
totalMemory: 11.76GiB freeMemory: 11.32GiB
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190772: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1512] Adding visible gpu devices: 0
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190936: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:984] Device interconnect StreamExecutor with strength 1 edge matrix:
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190944: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:990]      0 
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190948: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1003] 0:   N 
2022-08-06 05:04:05.190981: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1115] Created TensorFlow device (/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0 with 11014 MB memory) -> physical GPU (device: 0, name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060, pci bus id: 0000:09:00.0, compute capability: 8.6)

The GUI pops up an error after a while:
__main__.py not responding

I have tried many different things, but its not working

I have checked the compatibility of tf/cudnn/cuda/python

Please help.

### Operating System

operating system - ubuntu 20.04

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version - 2.2rc2

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu - rtx3060

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### Anything else?

_No response_
